GSP29nysu51pu:1: 1.0 sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpāj jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:2: tad vistareṇa vibhajyate tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:6_0: 1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇoktāyā vistaro vaktavya itīdānīm ārabhyate sādharmyādisūtram sādharmyavaidharmyotkarṣāpakarṣavarṇyāvarṇyavikalpasādhyaprāptyaprāptiprasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntānutpattisaṃśayaprakaraṇāhetvarthāpattyaviśeṣopapattyupalabdhyanupalabdhyanityanityakāryasamāḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:6_1: sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ / aviśeṣaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:6_2: tatra tatrodāhariṣyāmaḥ / evaṃ vaidharmyasamaprabhṛtayo 'pi nirvaktavyāḥ // NySBh_20 //
GSP29nysu51pu:9_1: aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / nidarśanaṃ kriyāvān ātmā
GSP29nysu51pu:9_2: dravyasya kriyāhetuguṇayogāt / dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā
GSP29nysu51pu:9_3: cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti / evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate
GSP29nysu51pu:9_4: niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cātmā
GSP29nysu51pu:9_5: tasmān niṣkriya iti / na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:9_6: na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti / viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedho
GSP29nysu51pu:9_7: bhavati / atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca
GSP29nysu51pu:9_8: tathātmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti / na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt
GSP29nysu51pu:9_9: kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:9_10: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:9_11: niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti / vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:9_12: niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathātmā tasmān na niṣkriya
GSP29nysu51pu:9_13: iti / na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt
GSP29nysu51pu:9_14: kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ / atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:9_15: kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān
GSP29nysu51pu:9_16: niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:12_0: 1.3 sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā
GSP29nysu51pu:12_1: sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate gosādharmyād gotvāj jātiviśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati na tu
GSP29nysu51pu:12_2: sāsnādisambandhāt / aśvādivaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇādibhedāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:12_3: tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:12_4: samānaṃ vākye iti / hetvābhāsāśrayā khalv iyam avyavastheti //
GSP29nysu51pu:16_0: 1.4 dṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ sādhye samāsañjayata utkarśasamaḥ / yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat
GSP29nysu51pu:16_1: kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti / atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān
GSP29nysu51pu:16_2: api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti / sādhye dharmābhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntāt
GSP29nysu51pu:16_3: prasañjayato 'pakarśasamaḥ / loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān
GSP29nysu51pu:16_4: avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti / khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:16_5: tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ / sādhanadharmayukte
GSP29nysu51pu:16_6: dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ / kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:16_7: kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcit
GSP29nysu51pu:16_8: kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid akriyaṃ yathātmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti / hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī
GSP29nysu51pu:16_9: dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ / yadi yathā loṣṭas tathātmā
GSP29nysu51pu:16_10: prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti / sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo
GSP29nysu51pu:16_11: 'pi sādhyaḥ atha naivaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathātmā //
GSP29nysu51pu:20_0: 1.5 alabhyaḥ siddhasya nihnavaḥ / siddhaṃ ca kiṃcitsādhatmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus
GSP29nysu51pu:20_1: tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum / evaṃ sādhake
GSP29nysu51pu:20_2: dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt
GSP29nysu51pu:23: 1.6 yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ tenāviparīto 'rtho 'tidiśyate prajñāpanārtham / evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:25: 1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau //
GSP29nysu51pu:26: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:27: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ / dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:28: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti / prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:32: 1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:34: 1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau//
GSP29nysu51pu:36_0: 1.9 sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:36_1: pratiṣedhaḥ / kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate na ca hetum
GSP29nysu51pu:36_2: antereṇa siddhir astīti / pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ / kriyāvān
GSP29nysu51pu:36_3: ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate kriyāhetuguṇayuktam
GSP29nysu51pu:36_4: ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyāhetuguṇaḥ ?
GSP29nysu51pu:40: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam upādadate kimarthaṃ veti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:41: didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśyadarśanārtham iti / atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate ?
GSP29nysu51pu:42_0: antareṇāpi pradīpāntataṃ dṛśyate pradīpaḥ tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:42_1: nirarthakam / atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:43_0: yadi prajñāpanārthaṃ prajñāto dṛṣṭāntaḥ / sa khalu “laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe
GSP29nysu51pu:43_1: buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta” iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram //
GSP29nysu51pu:47_0: 1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:47_1: sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti / evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:47_2: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:51: 1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysu51pu:53: nityasya cotpattir nāsti / anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:55: NyS_5,1.13 tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:57: 1.13 tathābhāvād utpannasyeti / utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati / prāg utapatteḥ śabda eva nāsti,
GSP29nysu51pu:58: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:59: kāraṇopapatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ “prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād” iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:60: NyS_5,1.14 sāmānya+dṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:62: 1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:67: 1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:70_0: na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate / evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād
GSP29nysu51pu:70_1: avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate / yadi vai labhate,
GSP29nysu51pu:71_0: tataḥ sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyānucchedād atyantaṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt / gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe
GSP29nysu51pu:71_1: nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate / na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe
GSP29nysu51pu:74: 1.16 ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā / anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysu51pu:75_0: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad
GSP29nysu51pu:75_1: iti / evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na
GSP29nysu51pu:76_1: hetau / tad idaṃ prakaraṇānativṛttyā pratyavasthānaṃ prakaraṇasamaḥ / samānaṃ caitad vaidharmye 'pi,
GSP29nysu51pu:80: 1.17 ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati / yady ubhayasādharmyaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:81: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati / pratipakṣopapatter anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:84: pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedhopapattiś ceti vipratiṣiddham iti / tattvānavadhāraṇāc ca prakriyāsiddhir viparyaye prakaraṇāvasānāt,
GSP29nysu51pu:89: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet / yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam,
GSP29nysu51pu:91: atha paścād, asati sādhane kasyedaṃ sādhyam ?
GSP29nysu51pu:93: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate / ahetunā sādharmyāt prayavasthānam ahetusamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:96: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddheḥ / nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:97: so 'yaṃ mahān pratyakṣaviṣaya udāharaṇam iti / yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:98: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti //
GSP29nysu51pu:101: 1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:105_0: 1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā
GSP29nysu51pu:105_1: pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ / yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:107: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:109: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:111: 1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysu51pu:112_0: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti / anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:112_1: ubhayapakṣasamā ceyam arthāpattiḥ / yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:114_0: anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti / na ceyaṃ viparyayamātrād ekāntenārthāpattiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:114_1: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:115: NyS_5,1.23 ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvopapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:117: 1.23 eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysu51pu:121: NyS_5,1.24 kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:123: 1.24 yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:125: yena aviśeṣaḥ syāt / atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:126: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti / tatra pratijñārthavyatiriktam anyad udāharaṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysu51pu:127: anudāharaṇaś ca hetur nāstīti / pratijñaikadeśasya codāharaṇatvam anupapannam,
GSP29nysu51pu:128_0: na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati / sataś ca nityānityabhāvād anityatvānupapattiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:128_1: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti / sarvabhāvānāṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:132_0: 1.25 yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy
GSP29nysu51pu:132_1: upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate / ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya
GSP29nysu51pu:135: 1.26 ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:136: yadi pratiṣidhyate nobhayakāraṇopapattiḥ syāt / ubhayakāraṇopapattivacanād anityatvakāraṇopapattir abhyanujñāyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:137: abhyanujñānād anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / vyāghātāt pratiṣedha iti cet,
GSP29nysu51pu:138: samāno vyāghātaḥ / ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ?
GSP29nysu51pu:139: svapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:146: 1.28 prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:147: na kāryasya kāraṇaniyamaḥ / yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:149: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:150: āvaraṇādyanupalabdheḥ / yathā vidyamānasyodakāder arthasyāvaraṇāder anupalabdhiḥ naivaṃ śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇenāvaranādinānupalabdhiḥ / gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat,
GSP29nysu51pu:151: na gṛhyate / tasmād udakādiviparītaḥ śabdo 'nupalabhyamāna iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:152: NyS_5,1.29 tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:154_0: 1.29 teṣām āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhir nopalabhyate / anupalambhān nāstīty abhāvo 'syāḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:154_1: sidhyati / abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysu51pu:154_2: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ “na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir
GSP29nysu51pu:154_3: ity” etan na sidhyati / so 'yaṃ “hetur āvaraṇādyanupalabdher” ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau
GSP29nysu51pu:157: NySBh_5,1.30 āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir nāsti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ / kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:158: anupalambhātmakatvād anupalabdheḥ / upalambhābhāvamātratvād anupalabdheḥ / yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:159: upalabdhyā tad astīti pratijñāyate / yan nāsti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:160_0: anupalabhyamānaṃ nāstīti pratijñāyate / so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha
GSP29nysu51pu:160_1: upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nysu51pu:160_2: apratiṣiddhā cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhi hetutvāya kalpate / āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvād upalabdher viṣayāḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:161: teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam / yat tāni nopalabhyante,
GSP29nysu51pu:162: tadupalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti / anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati,
GSP29nysu51pu:166_0: 1.31 ahetur iti varttate / śarīre śarīre jñānavikalpānāṃ bhāvābhāvau saṃvedanīyau /
GSP29nysu51pu:166_1: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti / evaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamasmṛtijñāneṣu /
GSP29nysu51pu:166_2: seyam āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir
GSP29nysu51pu:166_3: iti nopalabdhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti / tatra yad uktaṃ tadanupalabdher
GSP29nysu51pu:171_0: 1.32 anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:171_1: sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate / so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād
GSP29nysu51pu:175_1: tasya pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyaṃ pratijñādiyogaḥ / tad yady anityasādharmyād
GSP29nysu51pu:179: 1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:181: 1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:183: kenacit samānaḥ kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ / sāmānyāt sādharmyaṃ viśeṣāc ca vaidharmyam / evaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:184: nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ vā / sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha “sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasama” iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:185: etad ayuktam iti / aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51pu:186: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:187: NySBh_5,1.35 anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyate / tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam ?
GSP29nysu51pu:189: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti / atha na sarvadā bhavati ?
GSP29nysu51pu:190: anityatvasyābhāvān nityaḥ śabdaḥ / evaṃ nityatvena pratyavasthānān nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:192: NyS_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:194: 1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:195: anityatvopapatteś ca “nānityaḥ śabda” iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate / atha nābhyupagamyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:196: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti / utapannasya nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasyānityatvaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:197: tatra paripraśnānupapattiḥ / yo 'yaṃ paripaśnaḥ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysu51pu:199: utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam ;
GSP29nysu51pu:200: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti / nityānityatvavirodhāc ca / nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
GSP29nysu51pu:201: na sambhavataḥ / tatra yad uktaṃ nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysu51pu:205: 1.37 prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti / yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysu51pu:207: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate / evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate / prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnām,
GSP29nysu51pu:208: vyavadhānāpohāc cābhivyaktir vyavahitānām / tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti / kāryāviśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ kāryasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:212: 1.38 sati kāryānyatve anupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ prayatnasyāhetutvaṃ śabdasyābhivyaktau / yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:217: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti / yadi cānaikāntikatvād asādhakatvam
GSP29nysu51pu:221: kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti / atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:222: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ / so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:225: 1.40 sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:228_0: 1.41 yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya
GSP29nysu51pu:228_1: vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ / tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:228_2: sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ / “prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama” iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā
GSP29nysu51pu:228_3: dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ / sa ca pratiṣedha ity ucyate / tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa
GSP29nysu51pu:228_4: iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate / tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno
GSP29nysu51pu:229: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysu51pu:231_0: 1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
GSP29nysu51pu:231_1: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
GSP29nysu51pu:235: 1.43 sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati / kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:236_1: pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati / itthaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:236_2: cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati / tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre
GSP29nysu51pu:236_3: hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati / kathaṃ kṛtvā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:238_0: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha / evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya
GSP29nysu51pu:238_1: pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:238_2: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo
GSP29nysu51pu:239_0: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato
GSP29nysu51pu:239_1: matānujñā prasajyata iti / sa khalv ayaṃ ṣaṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ / tatra khalu sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:241: nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid asti / samānas tṛṭīyapañcamayoḥ punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:242: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate / pañcamapakṣe 'pi “pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo“+abhyupagamyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:243: nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyata iti / tatra pañcamaṣaṣṭapakṣayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:245: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ / kadā ṣaṭpakṣī ?
GSP29nysu51pu:246_0: yadā “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” ity evaṃ pravarttate / tadobhayoḥ pakṣayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:246_1: yadā tu “kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter” ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yajyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:248: nābhivyaktir” iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti //
